Format Multiple Citations

Source: R/xct_keys_to_xref.R
xct_format.Rd

Formats one or more citation keys into a single inline reference.

Usage

xct_format(raw_key, bib_obj, ...)

Arguments

raw_key

A raw citation key string, possibly with brackets.

bib_obj

The bibliography object.

...

Additional arguments passed from the main function.

Value

Formatted citation as a string.

See also

Other cite: xct_assemble(), xct_bib_keys_missing(), xct_format_single(), xct_keys_extract(), xct_keys_to_inline(), xct_keys_to_xref()
